level.heading: Disclosure of personnel information.
level.text: It is the policy of the District government to make personnel information in its possession or under its control available upon request to appropriate personnel and law-enforcement authorities, except if such disclosure would constitute an unwarranted invasion of personal privacy or is prohibited under law or rules and regulations issued pursuant thereto.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 2-139, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 1-601.01.
